title: How to stop AA?
body: I play support karma, and due to basic attacks that i have no clue how to stop reveals me in the bushes how do i stop AAing is there a key i can press or an option i can change in settings

replies.body: Its best to turn off the auto-attack setting, It jsut creates problems, and messes up CS.
There is a setting in the in game menus. It's Auto Attack I believe. Not sure which sub menu, but probably Gameplay.
You can turn of aas in options

S is the default command for stop. It cancels everything you are doing and makes you stand still.

However, if you walk into a bush and are auto attacking creeps/champions without commanding yourself to is usually means the bush is warded (or you used attack-move command)
Just press S, you don't need to turn it off in options like everyones telling you unless you really want to play like that.
S causes you to stop moving and attacking, but be aware if you walk into a bush and DON'T click on an enemy, it will not AA unless the bush is warded.
